meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Romania.
meanings.sent1: In Romania, you can buy many things with one leu.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for leu at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The leu in my pocket felt like a magical coin.
meanings.sent4: Her savings dwindled down to a single leu.
meanings.sent5: The shiny leu sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Moldova.
meanings.sent1: She received ten leu as a gift from her grandparents.
meanings.sent2: The price of the book was twenty leu.
meanings.sent3: Finding a lost leu in the couch made her day.
meanings.sent4: His dreams were worth more than any amount of leu.
meanings.sent5: The leu jingled in his pocket as he walked.

meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the patient's leu count.
meanings.sent2: Healthy individuals have many leu fighting infections.
meanings.sent3: The leu in the microscope waved at the other cells.
meanings.sent4: The leu army defended the body against invaders.
meanings.sent5: Each leu worked tirelessly to keep the body healthy.
